cycle-of-chaos.name: Cycle of Chaos
cycle-of-chaos.message: Voidwalker will cast this or Cycle of Retribution.

cycle-of-retribution.name: Cycle of Retribution
cycle-of-retribution.message: Voidwalker will cast this or Cycle of Chaos.

c-1.name: Doomvoid Slicer (CoR) or Doomvoid Guillotine (CoC)
c-1.message: Voidwalker will either one of these.

c-2.name: Doomvoid Cleaver (CoR) or Doomvoid Slicer (CoC)
c-2.message: Voidwalker will either one of these.

c-3.name: Doomvoid Guillotine (CoR) or Doomvoid Cleaver (CoC)
c-3.message: Voidwalker will either one of these.

dark-fire-3.name: Dark Fire III
dark-fire-3.message: Position yourself away from other players and telegraphs.

doomvoid-cleaver.name: Doomvoid Cleaver
doomvoid-cleaver.message: Position yourself in your designated position.

doomvoid-guillotine.name: Doomvoid Guillotine
doomvoid-guillotine.message: Position yourself to the sides of Voidwalker.

enrage.name: Quietus
enrage.message: Defeat Voidwalker or you will die.

empty-hate-or-empty-rage.name: Empty Hate or Empty Rage
empty-hate-or-empty-rage.message: The Hand of Erebos will cast only one.

empty-hate.name: Empty Hate
empty-hate.message: The Hand of Erebos will do a raid knockback.

empty-rage.name: Empty Rage
empty-rage.message: The Hand of Erebos will do a raid cleave.

equilibrium.name: Equilibrium
equilibrium.message: Position yourself with your partner to mitigate incoming damage.

flare.name: Flare
flare.message: Position yourself at your designated position.

hell-wind.name: Hell Wind
hell-wind.message: Marked players will be reduced to 1 health.

punishing-ray.name: Punishing Ray
punishing-ray.message: Position yourself at your designated position to mitigate incoming damage.

shadoweye-and-flare.name: Flare & Shadoweye (x2)
shadoweye-and-flare.message: Position yourself at your designated position and turn away from Shadoweye.

shadoweye-and-hell-wind-and-unholy-darkn.name: Unholy Darkness, Shadoweye & Hellwind
shadoweye-and-hell-wind-and-unholy-darkn.message: Stack, unless you have Hellwind, and turn away from Shadoweye.

shadoweye-and-punishing-ray.name: Punishing Ray & Shadoweye
shadoweye-and-punishing-ray.message: Position yourself at your designated position and turn away from Shadoweye.

shadoweye.name: Shadoweye
shadoweye.message: Do not face the marked player.

shadowflame.name: Shadowflame
shadowflame.message: Tanks will be hit with a targetted ability.
